name: 42-18 sweetheart beanie
notes:
**knitted hat for babies and children in drops babymerino. the piece is worked with rib and stocking stitch. sizes 0 to 4 years.**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

drops design: pattern bm-126-by
yarn group a

-----------------------------------------------------------

**sizes**:
0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months (2 - 3/4) years
fits head-size:
34/38 - 40/42 - 42/44 - 44/46 (48/50 - 50/52) cm

**materials**:
drops baby merino from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group a)
50-50-50-50 (50-50) g colour 39, purple orchid

needles:
drops double pointed needles size 3 mm.
drops double pointed needles size 2.5 mm.

**knitting tension:**
24 stitches in width and 32 rows in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.
note: needle size is only a guide. if you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. if you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
